author: parithosh
content: Has anyone tried to use kurtosis to test their local kiln v1 compatible builds? Would love to hear how that went ğŸ™‚

author: tbenr
content: in that regard, if anyone wants to test teku in "kiln" mode, there is new hidden param  `--Xee-version kiln` . If not specified, teku is currently configured to run in "kintsugi" mode by default.

author: parithosh
content: that's good to know! thanks ğŸ™‚

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Yeah that error message can be ignored. With the new semantics we break the assumption in another place that we can not reorg to a head below the current head
